title: Pure Public Goods and Private Markets

content.question: If a pure public good is provided only by a private market, then generally the good will

choices.label: be overproduced relative to the socially optimal quantity
be underproduced relative to the socially optimal quantity

content.answer: be underproduced relative to the socially optimal quantity

unit.text: 6: Market Failure and the Role of Government

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
